sources.title: Stories by Andre Cronje on Medium

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 DVT network SSV launched its permissionless mainnet, removing the limitation that restricts the onboarding of validators and operators only to launch partners. Clearpool launches Clearpool Prime on OP Mainnet. Prime allows whitelisted, institutional borrowers to launch pools with tailored terms and invite similarly whitelisted lenders to participate.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - SSV Permissionless Mainnet Live, Conic Finance to Launch V2, High-Yield Stable Farm on Kava, Access Solana DeFi with EVM Wallet, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Poolshark launched on Arbitrum mainnet along with its token sale. Poolshark Protocol is an AMM that enables directional LPing. Powered by Wormhole, Circle, and Base, Pike Finance launches testnet on Ethereum, Optimism, Arbitrum, and Base L2. Pike is a cross-chain lending protocol that offers lending, leverage, and Earn services.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Poolshark Live on Arbitrum, Uniswap Expands to Bitcoin Sidechain, Sen. Warren Introduces Anti-Crypto Bill, Bridging to Solana with Ease, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Options protocol Lyra launches Lyra Chain, an OP stack-powered L2 providing high throughput, low-cost settlement of transactions. Upcoming ⏳ Synthetix Spartan Council is voting to end SNX inflation. If approved, SNX inflation will be reduced to zero in the claim week following the vote.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra Chain Live, Synthetix Voting to End Inflation, LayerZero Confirms Token, Low-Risk LPing with Airdrop, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Dec 4th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - QuickSwap Bonds Live, Liquity Introduces Desktop Frontend, LSDfi Apollo Launching on Neutron, Kamino Points Coming, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Gyroscope launches GYD, a dollar-pegged stablecoin backed by reserve assets, and features an algorithmic mechanism to keep its price pegged to $1. Users can now mint GYD or provide liquidity to GYD pools. Crypto Volatility Index launches CVI V4, introducing new features such as the Hedged Theta Vault, a ~3x stretched version of the CVI, borrower leverage, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Gyroscope Launches GYD Stablecoin, Safe Introduces Recovery Hub , Marginfi to Launch Solana LST-backed Stablecoin, High Yield Staking on Avalanche, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Aevo launches aeUSD, a yield-bearing stables-denominated collateral asset (5% USDC and 95% sDAI) that allows users to earn a 4.75% APY on their exchange margin while trading with 20x leverage. QuickSwap launches QuickSwap Bonds on the DEX, a new way for liquidity provision. Users can provide liquidity and receive tokens at a discount that vest over time, represented by a Bond NFT.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Launches Yield-Bearing aeUSD, Worldcoin Decentralizing, New Lending Pool with OP Rewards, No Fee Swaps with Airdrop, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Helium Mobile launches a nationwide plan in the US. with unlimited data, text, and talk that costs $20 a month. Helium Mobile combines the Solana-based IoT project Helium Network and a nationwide 5G network. Hashflow DEX launches 2.0. The upgraded version enables Smart Order Routing (SOR), improved UX, and Solana expansion.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Helium Launches $20 Unlimited Mobile Plans, Matcha Launches Cross-chain Swaps, Premia Blue Season, Upcoming Airdrop on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Mantle L2 launches two products: Mantle LSP and mETH. Mantle LSP is a liquid staking protocol that enables users to stake ETH for mETH and earn rewards. Updates 🆕 Aave DAO proposes to increase the GHO borrow rate from 5.35% APR to 6.35% APR to support the GHO peg restoration and align borrowing costs with market rates.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Mantle Launches mETH LSD, Osmosis Merger Proposal, 20%+ Stable Farms, Upcoming TGE Analysis, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Obol Mainnet Live Obol launched Mainnet Open Beta with three products available: Mainnet DV Launchpad, Obol SDK, and Obol Splits. StarkDefi on Starknet StarkDeFi launches an AMM on Starknet Mainnet, with other features coming soon: Farm, Launchpad, Quest, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Obol Mainnet Live, Platypus Hackers Acquitted, Rhino Announces New Token, High Stable Yields, and more...

articles.description: Recap: Week of Nov 27th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - RageTrade V2 Beta Live, Sei Announces V2, Poolshark Announces FIN, Moonwell Rewards on Base, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Yearn V3 Live on Polygon Yearn V3 introduces Tokenized Strategies, allowing for standalone, single-strategy vaults that are ERC-4626 compatible. V3 is now on Polygon and will be rolling out slowly, with new Vaults and strategies added over time ahead of launching on other chains.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn V3 Live, Hacker Demands to Take Over Kyber, Cega Dual Currency Strategies, Optimized LPing on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 SDX Live on Solana Solana Derivatives Exchange (SDX) launches on Solana. SDX enables options trading on Solana, with mSOL as the first supported option market. Econia Live on Aptos Econia, a Dragonfly-backed on-chain order book, launches on Aptos mainnet. Econia provides the infrastructure and allows users to trade with their frontend partners such as Aries Markets, Gator Trade, KanaLabs, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - SDX Live on Solana, QuickSwap Smart Pools on Manta, Kujira Futures Soon, Easy and Profitable LPing, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 StakeWise V3 Live StakeWise V3 is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. V3 introduces a new approach to liquid staking, “any node operator and staker on Ethereum can mint osETH, a liquid staking token, to represent ETH staked on their nodes.” V3 also comes with a marketplace of staking offers through smart contracts called Vaults.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome & Aerodrome Frontend Exploit, StakeWise V3 Live, Cryptex V2 on Arbitrum, NFT Lending on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Updates 🆕 Call for Cosmos Chain Split In response to a recently passed proposal that reduces ATOM inflation, Cosmos founder Jae Kwon called for a chain split and referred to the hard fork as AtomOne. The forked chain would support the ATOM token along with the native ATOM1.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Call for Cosmos Chain Split, Timeswap Premine on Polygon zkEVM, JITO Token and Airdrop, Yield Boosted LPing, and more...

articles.description: Launches 🚀 RainFi on Solana RainFi, a P2P NFT lending protocol on Solana, is live. RainFi lets users lend SOL/USDC/mSOL, and borrow SOL using their NFT as collateral. IOTX Liquid Staking Bedrock launches liquid staking for IOTX. IOTX holders can now stake IOTX to receive reward-accruing uniIOTX.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - RainFi NFT Lending on Solana, dYdX Trading Rewards Coming, Automated LPing with Good Rewards, Today in DeFi Black Friday Sale, and more...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - KyberSwap 47M Exploit, HecoChain & HTX 110M Exploit, Deri V4 Live, Liquid Staking on Cosmos, and more...

articles.description: Launches 🚀 Beta Finance V2 Live Beta Finance launches V2 (Omni), a lending market with risk tranches. V2 enables users to choose their level of exposure based on their individual risk appetites. ZKP2P Alpha Live ZKP2P launches an alpha version on Base L2. ZKP2P is a trustless fiat-to-crypto onramp protocol powered by ZKPs.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Beta Finance V2, Dyson Full Launch Soon, Aragon Sues Its Founding Team, Invest in Delta-Neutral Pools, and more...
